title: Connection Failure, please help!
body: I've had this for three days now. For the first day, it occurred but after restarting the client a couple of times I managed to get into the game, but the day after I wasn't able to log in for the whole day. Yesterday, the same thing happened. This is really bugging me, I've tried everything I can think of, and nothing works. Anyone have any ideas or know how to fix it? I really want to fix this, I'm so close to getting {{champion:126}}  level 5. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?
It's ok, it seems to be working fine now, but thank you for answering :D

I didn't want to say that it's the servers but it was probably the servers then.

Best of luck in the field of pyjamas!
